Name: Teary Cape
LongDescription: Prevents Pokémon from taking critical hits. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bonsly and Sudowoodo.  You can get a Teary Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Bonsly Dew, a Bonsly Card, and an Arid Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
